name: @brikcss/stylelint-config-css
description: CSS stylelint shareable configuration by brikcss.
author: The Zimmee <thezimmee@gmail.com>

scripts.// [START]: Run `npm start` as an alias for development.
scripts.// [WATCH]: For local development. Watches files, rebuilds when source files change, runs local server with live reload.
scripts.// [TESTS]: UI and unit tests, as well as code quality checkers.
scripts.test: npm prune && npm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names=css:lint,js:lint "npm run css:lint:valid" "npm run js:lint" || npm run test:fail
scripts.css:watch: npm run css:lint:all && chokidar ./tests/*.css -c 'stylelint {path} && echo "[ok] CSS lint complete."' --verbose
scripts.// [GIT|HUSKY]: // Helpers for interacting with git and husky (githooks).
scripts.commit:
echo "See the "git commit policy" in CONTRIBUTING.md for details on how to write a valid commit message.
" && git-cz
scripts.// prepush:: Runs tests and checks for a clean state (excluding untracked files).
scripts.prepush:
npm run git:checkstage && echo "
Pushing code...
"
scripts.// [RELEASE]: Semantic release manages our release process.
scripts.release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
